issue.title: How to replay logs from cloudsim?

content.raw: I added the link to developer and it kind of works. Now the main problem is that with every update of the models, the folders inside the main models change name. For example, I had a folder called subt\_tunnel\_staging\_area/3 but after updating the models now I have a folder called subt\_tunnel\_staging\_area/4 and my log seems to want folder 3 and fails to find the folder.  Similar happened to the folder X1 Config 1/11 which changed to 12. I think this is what #213 is seeing.
content.html: I added the link to developer and it kind of works. Now the main problem is that with every update of the models, the folders inside the main models change name. For example, I had a folder called subt_tunnel_staging_area/3 but after updating the models now I have a folder called subt_tunnel_staging_area/4 and my log seems to want folder 3 and fails to find the folder. Similar happened to the folder X1 Config 1/11 which changed to 12. I think this is what #213 is seeing.
